select count(id) from TBL_COMPANYINFO t where 1=1
and t.town like CONCAT(CONCAT( '',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and t.companyname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
